title: 2020 Prestige Skin Shop and Borders (Ideas and suggestions)
body:
Hi! so i have one major issue with the way the 2020 system will work. read up on the original post before you read mine!

Original Topic Here!: 
https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/prestige-updates?utm_source=LeagueClient&utm_medium=OverviewTier2Pos1&fbclid=IwAR24rPE1M7MTBSbuLXQMMmEwSXCs4ZQOtgpEtajVC0-le1pxdhD7TZwAvjk


 First of all my major issue is that people who re-roll the skins/get  a lucky drop wont get the border or icon, instead they will have to get a event pass/something else to get the border.
 (For someone like myself who just re-rolls skins now, thats kinda annoying that we wont be able to work towards the now exclusive chromas, icons etc in favour of getting that shiny prestige border and icon)

 I suggest that maybe the icon/border be reduced if the player unlocks the skin via re-rolls or the shard. that way players who still want the border or icon still get it! just at a bit of a cheaper margin (Similar to how people would get variant skins) 

 Secondly is that i feel like the Event prestige skins should have a prestige border to **MATCH THE EVENT!** this year seeing the same old prestige border over and over felt kind of lacklustre. I would of loved to have seen SG Neekos gold star in place of her green one with the prestige skin, with some different flares ect around it. same goes for Project irelia, and arcade Caitlyns prestige skins. I personally feel as this would make that border more special with the icon rather than an icon and that same prestige border. (See below for an idea) (because IMO the current border looks more like a golden K/DA border than any other prestige skin out there) 

Overall i dont work at Riot i dont know how these things are decided, but I feel like they should at least be heard by the community, thanks for the read peoples!
